feed.title: WeKan Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.70
entry.content:
This release adds the following new features:

  • Helm Chart: Allow to define securityContext for pod and containers. Thanks to maitredede.
  • Move card to archive, add shortcut key รท for Persian keyboard. Thanks to mohammadZahedian and xet7.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Helm Chart: Service account token does not need to be mounted in op. Thanks to maitredede.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.71
entry.content:
This release adds the following new features:

  • To menu right top username, added Support, to have info about from where to get support. Thanks to xet7.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.72
entry.content:
This release adds the following new features:

  • Optional board list auto-width, Support for min & max width for lists. Thanks to NadavTasher.

and adds the following updates:

  • Disabled syncing of old and unrelated docker containers between docker registries. Thanks to xet7.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Fix in API user role is not considered. Thanks to mohammadZahedian and xet7.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.73
entry.content:
This release adds the following updates:

  • Changed the default maximum list width. Thanks to NadavTasher.
  • Updated Developer Docs about docker compose. Thanks to sridharin2020 and xet7.
  • Hide support popup. It will be made editable later. Thanks to xet7.
  • Hide Accessibility Settings at Admin Panel. It will be continued and added back later. Thanks to xet7.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Fix buggy behaviours in board dragscrolling. Thanks to NadavTasher.
  • Revert back to have shortcut "c to archive" back for non-Persian keyboards. Thanks to hatl and xet7.
  • Hide and disable Keyboard Shortcuts, because they make using Ctrl-C to copy etc impossible. Part 1, Part 2, Part 3. Thanks to xet7.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.74
entry.content:
This release fixes the following bugs:

  • Restore keyboard shortcuts, enable per-user toggle, fix Ctrl + C bug by checking the text selection range. Thanks to NadavTasher.
  • Fixed keyboard shortcuts defaults, icons and texts to be more understandable. Thanks to xet7.
  • "Auto List Width" is now at "List โฐ Set Width" popup. Thanks to xet7.
  • Keyboard Shortcuts Enable/Disable is now at Right Sidebar, where already was list of Keyboard Shortcuts. Thanks to xet7.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.
